NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
ADDIU A1 R0 -5 ; Number of coins needed for event here. Remember to
; keep as negative number (so game will subtract coins).

; Display the coin change by the player stats
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
ADDIU A1 R0 -5 ; Number of coins needed for event here. Remember to
; keep as negative number (so game will subtract coins).

; Sleep for 30 frames to let coin change take effect
JAL SleepProcess
ADDIU A0 R0 30
NOP
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player Index at V0
NOP

LI S0 0x0 ; Start with Player 1 
LUI S1 hi(p1_item1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_item1) ; S1 is the address of Player 1's First Item

STARTp:
BEQ S0 V0 checkslotspo
NOP

ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to check the next Player
ADDIU S1 S1 0x38 ; This makes it load the next Player's First Item
J STARTp
NOP
;FIND CURRENT PLAYER END---------------------------------------------

;CHECK ITEM SLOTS START----------------------------------------------
checkslotspo:
ADDIU S0 R0 0xFF ; 0xFF = No Item Value
LBU S2 0(S1) ; S2 is the value of the item in the first slot
BEQ S0 S2 getitemp ; Go to itemmessage if the first slot is empty
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to check Slot #2
LBU S2 0(S1) ; S2 is the value of the item in the second slot
BEQ S0 S2 getitemp ; Go to itemmessage if the second slot is empty
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to check Slot #3
LBU S2 0(S1) ; S2 is the value of the item in the third slot
BEQ S0 S2 getitemp ; Go to itemmessage if the third slot is empty
NOP

LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

PlayVoice:
ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

LUI T1 hi(p1_char)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(p1_char) ; Load Player 1's Character address
LI T0 0x38 ; Distance between each player's Character address
MULT A0 T0 ;  Multiply Current Player Index by S3
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to S3

ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get current Player's Star address
LBU T0 0(T1) ; Load address value into S2

ADDIU V0 T0 0x2BE ; Mario's Despair Index

JAL PlaySound
MOVE A0 V0
NOP

LW RA 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 32

King Boo Carnival Free Skeleton Key.code:
; NAME: King Boo Carnival Free Skeleton Key
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

;====================================================================
; IMPORTANT: This code is specifically designed to give the landing
;            or passing player an item of your choice. If they have
;            no space to carry the item, they will receive nothing.
;===================================================================

ADDIU SP SP -48
SW RA 44(SP)
SW S1 40(SP)
SW S2 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)



;FIND CURRENT PLAYER START-------------------------------------------
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player Index at V0
NOP

LI S0 0x0 ; Start with Player 1 
LUI S1 hi(p1_item1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_item1) ; S1 is the address of Player 1's First Item

START:
BEQ S0 V0 checkslots
NOP

ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to check the next Player
ADDIU S1 S1 0x38 ; This makes it load the next Player's First Item
J START
NOP
;FIND CURRENT PLAYER END---------------------------------------------

;CHECK ITEM SLOTS START----------------------------------------------
checkslots:
ADDIU S0 R0 0xFF ; 0xFF = No Item Value
LBU S2 0(S1) ; S2 is the value of the item in the first slot
BEQ S0 S2 itemmessage ; Go to itemmessage if the first slot is empty
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to check Slot #2
LBU S2 0(S1) ; S2 is the value of the item in the second slot
BEQ S0 S2 itemmessage ; Go to itemmessage if the second slot is empty
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to check Slot #3
LBU S2 0(S1) ; S2 is the value of the item in the third slot
BEQ S0 S2 itemmessage ; Go to itemmessage if the third slot is empty
NOP
; If the Player has 3 Items, they'll get the "No Item" message
;CHECK ITEM SLOTS END------------------------------------------------

;NO ITEM MESSAGE DISPLAY START---------------------------------------
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(noitem)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(noitem) ; This loads "noitem" into the Textbox
LI A2 0x0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
LI A3 0x0

; The rest here perform the "wait for confirmation"
; and probably messagebox teardown.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J exit ; Player got no item, exit
NOP
;NO ITEM MESSAGE DISPLAY END-----------------------------------------

;GOT ITEM MESSAGE DISPLAY START--------------------------------------
itemmessage:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(gotitem)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(gotitem) ; This loads "gotitem" into the Textbox
LI A2 0x0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
LI A3 0x0

; The rest here perform the "wait for confirmation"
; and probably messagebox teardown.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP
;GOT ITEM MESSAGE DISPLAY END----------------------------------------

;GIVE ITEM START-----------------------------------------------------
LI S0 0x01 ; S0 contains Mushroom Value
SB S0 0(S1) ; Place Mushroom on empty Item slot

; 0x00 = Mushroom
; 0x01 = Skeleton Key
; 0x02 = Poison Mushroom
; 0x03 = Reverse Mushroom
; 0x04 = Cellular Shopper
; 0x05 = Warp Block
; 0x06 = Plunder Chest
; 0x07 = Bowser Phone
; 0x08 = Dueling Glove
; 0x09 = Lucky Lamp
; 0x0A = Golden Mushroom
; 0x0B = Boo Bell
; 0x0C = Boo Repellant
; 0x0D = Bowser Suit
; 0x0E = Magic Lamp
; 0x0F = Koopa Card
; 0x10 = Barter Box
; 0x11 = Lucky Coin
; 0x12 = Wacky Watch
;GIVE ITEM END-------------------------------------------------------

;SOUND START---------------------------------------------------------
LI A0 0x10C ; Turn Start Sound Index
; Use the Audio Player on PP64 to find other sound indexes to use
; Then use the following link to know what Sound Index you need
; https://pastebin.com/H1jxNFqr
JAL PlaySound 
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE A0 V0
LUI T1 hi(p1_char)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(p1_char) ; Load Player 1's Character address
LI T0 0x38 ; Distance between each player's Character address
MULT A0 T0 ;  Multiply Current Player Index by S3
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to S3

ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get current Player's Star address
LBU T0 0(T1) ; Load address value into S2

ADDIU V0 T0 0x2BE ; Mario's Despair Index

JAL PlaySound
MOVE A0 V0
NOP

LI A0 -1 ; Player Index (Current Player)
LI A1 5 ; Animation Index (Star)
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40
;SOUND END-----------------------------------------------------------



exit:
LW S1 40(SP)
LW S2 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
LW RA 44(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 48

; .ascii is used to output Text. Anything surrounded by " will be 
; displayed in the message (Special characters are not included).
; For those, you must use .byte and the respective byte value.
; Bytes that change text color will change the color of everything
; that is written after it, until another color is used.

.align 16
gotitem:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A
.ascii "Hope you"
.byte 0x5C
.ascii "re having fun at the carnival"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation Mark (!)
.byte 0x0A
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A
.ascii "Please enjoy this complimentary"
.byte 0x06
.ascii " ticket"
.byte 0x08
.byte 0x85
.byte 0xFF,0 ; FF=Pause

.align 16
noitem:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A
.ascii "Hope you"
.byte 0x5C
.ascii "re having fun at the carnival"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation Mark (!)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; FF=Pause

; Here's a list of the most common bytes you'll need
; .byte 0x01 ; Black Font
; .byte 0x03 ; Red Font
; .byte 0x04 ; Purple Font
; .byte 0x05 ; Green Font
; .byte 0x06 ; Blue font
; .byte 0x07 ; Yellow Font
; .byte 0x08 ; White Font
; .byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
; .byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation Mark (!)
; .byte 0xC3 ; Question Mark (?)
; .byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
; .byte 0x0A ; New Line (Writes Below)
; .byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
; .byte 0x29 ; Coin icon
; .byte 0x3D ; - (minus)
; .byte 0x3E ; x (multiply)
; .byte 0xFF,0 ; FF=Pause

; If your message has an image, use this at the start of each line
; .byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for picture

King Boo Carnival Lefty Curse.code:
; NAME: King Boo Carnival Lefty Curse
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Space

ADDIU SP SP -56
SW RA 52(SP)
SW S0 48(SP)
SW S1 44(SP)
SW S2 40(SP)
SW S3 36(SP)
SW S4 32(SP)

LI A0 Space_chain_index
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; Current Space Index at V0
LI A1 Space_chain_space_index

LI A0 -1 ; Current Player's Index
LI A1 10 ; Frames it takes to turn
JAL 0x800ED20C ; RotatePlayerModel
MOVE A2 V0 ; Space Index to face towards

START:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

SW R0 20(SP) ; A4
SW R0 24(SP) ; A5
SW R0 28(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Boo
LUI A1 hi(CurseSelection)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(CurseSelection)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 0
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
LI A1 0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S0 V0 ; S0 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
LI A0 0
BEQ S0 A0 yescurse
NOP
LI A0 1
BEQ S0 A0 nocurse
NOP
LI A0 2
BEQ S0 A0 view_map
NOP

view_map:
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J START
NOP

yescurse:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player's Index at V0
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
LI A1 5 ; A1 = The minimum amount of Coins to shop
JAL PlayerHasCoins ; Checks if Player has the minimum Coins 
NOP

LI S3 0
BEQ V0 R0 cannotpay ; If the player doesn't have the Coins, exit
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; at V0
NOP
LI T0 0x0
BEQ V0 T0 sameside
NOP
LI T0 0x2
BEQ V0 T0 sameside
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
ADDIU A1 R0 -5 ; Number of coins needed for event here. Remember to
; keep as negative number (so game will subtract coins).

; Display the coin change by the player stats
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
ADDIU A1 R0 -5 ; Number of coins needed for event here. Remember to
; keep as negative number (so game will subtract coins).

; Sleep for 30 frames to let coin change take effect
JAL SleepProcess
ADDIU A0 R0 30
NOP

LI A0 4 ; Assigns Happening fade-out
JAL InitFadeOut ; Fade to black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-out

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Sleep for 16 frames

LI S4 0
J removekeys
NOP

sameside:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

SW R0 20(SP) ; A4
SW R0 24(SP) ; A5
SW R0 28(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Boo
LUI A1 hi(SideSelection)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(SideSelection)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 0
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
LI A1 0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S0 V0 ; S0 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
LI A0 0
BEQ S0 A0 paycoins
NOP
LI A0 1
BEQ S0 A0 nocoins
NOP
LI A0 2
BEQ S0 A0 nocurse
NOP
LI A0 3
BEQ S0 A0 view_map2
NOP

view_map2:
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J sameside
NOP

paycoins:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player's Index at V0
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
LI A1 15 ; A1 = The minimum amount of Coins to shop
JAL PlayerHasCoins ; Checks if Player has the minimum Coins 
NOP

LI S3 1
BEQ V0 R0 cannotpay ; If the player doesn't have the Coins, exit
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
ADDIU A1 R0 -15 ; Number of coins needed for event here. Remember to
; keep as negative number (so game will subtract coins).

; Display the coin change by the player stats
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
ADDIU A1 R0 -15 ; Number of coins needed for event here. Remember to
; keep as negative number (so game will subtract coins).

; Sleep for 30 frames to let coin change take effect
JAL SleepProcess
ADDIU A0 R0 30
NOP

LI A0 4 ; Assigns Happening fade-out
JAL InitFadeOut ; Fade to black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-out

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Sleep for 16 frames

LI S3 0
LI S4 0
LI S0 0x0

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
BEQ S0 V0 p3check
NOP

LUI S1 hi(p1_item1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_item1) ; S1 is the address of Player 1's First Item

LI S0 0x01 ; Check for Skeleton Key
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 deletekeyp1paid
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 deletekeyp1paid
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 deletekeyp1paid
NOP

J failedcurse
NOP

deletekeyp1paid:
LI S0 0xFF ; S0 contains Empty Value
SB S0 0(S1) ; Place Empty Value into last-checked slot (Skeleton Key)
LI A0 0x0
JAL FixUpPlayerItemSlots
NOP
LI A0 0x0
JAL RefreshHUD
NOP

J cursed
NOP

cannotpay:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(cannotpaymsg)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(cannotpaymsg) ; This loads "leavemsg" into the Textbox
LI A2 0x0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
LI A3 0x0

; The rest here perform the "wait for confirmation"
; and probably messagebox teardown.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

BNE S3 R0 sameside
NOP

J exit
NOP

nocoins:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player's Index at V0
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
LI A1 5 ; A1 = The minimum amount of Coins to shop
JAL PlayerHasCoins ; Checks if Player has the minimum Coins 
NOP

LI S3 0
BEQ V0 R0 cannotpay ; If the player doesn't have the Coins, exit
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0

ADDIU A1 R0 -5 ; Number of coins needed for event here. Remember to
; keep as negative number (so game will subtract coins).

; Display the coin change by the player stats
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
ADDIU A1 R0 -5 ; Number of coins needed for event here. Remember to
; keep as negative number (so game will subtract coins).

; Sleep for 30 frames to let coin change take effect
JAL SleepProcess
ADDIU A0 R0 30
NOP

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none)

LUI A1 hi(nocoinsmsg)

LI A2 0x0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage

; The rest here perform the "wait for confirmation"

JAL 0x800EC9DC

NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LI A0 4 ; Assigns Happening fade-out
JAL InitFadeOut ; Fade to black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-out

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Sleep for 16 frames

LI S4 1
J removekeys
NOP

removekeys:
LI S3 0
LUI S1 hi(p1_item1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_item1) ; S1 is the address of Player 1's First Item

LI S0 0x01 ; Check for Skeleton Key
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 deletekeyp1
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 deletekeyp1
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)

NOP

p3check:
LUI S1 hi(p3_item1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p3_item1) ; S1 is the address of Player 1's First Item

LI S0 0x01 ; Check for Skeleton Key
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 deletekeyp3
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 deletekeyp3
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 deletekeyp3
NOP

cursecheck:
BNE S4 R0 selfcursedcheck
NOP

BNE S3 R0 cursed
NOP

J failedcurse
NOP

selfcursedcheck:
BNE S3 R0 selfcursed
NOP

J failedcurse
NOP

deletekeyp1:
LI S0 0xFF ; S0 contains Empty Value
SB S0 0(S1) ; Place Empty Value into last-checked slot (Skeleton Key)

NOP
LI A0 0x2

NOP

King Boo Carnival Righty Curse.code:
; NAME: King Boo Carnival Righty Curse
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Space

ADDIU SP SP -56
SW RA 52(SP)
SW S0 48(SP)
SW S1 44(SP)
SW S2 40(SP)
SW S3 36(SP)
SW S4 32(SP)

LI A0 Space_chain_index
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; Current Space Index at V0
LI A1 Space_chain_space_index

LI A0 -1 ; Current Player's Index
LI A1 10 ; Frames it takes to turn
JAL 0x800ED20C ; RotatePlayerModel
MOVE A2 V0 ; Space Index to face towards

START:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

SW R0 20(SP) ; A4
SW R0 24(SP) ; A5
SW R0 28(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Boo
LUI A1 hi(CurseSelection)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(CurseSelection)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 0
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
LI A1 0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S0 V0 ; S0 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
LI A0 0
BEQ S0 A0 yescurse
NOP
LI A0 1
BEQ S0 A0 nocurse
NOP
LI A0 2
BEQ S0 A0 view_map
NOP

view_map:
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J START
NOP

yescurse:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player's Index at V0
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
LI A1 5 ; A1 = The minimum amount of Coins to shop
JAL PlayerHasCoins ; Checks if Player has the minimum Coins 
NOP

LI S3 0
BEQ V0 R0 cannotpay ; If the player doesn't have the Coins, exit
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; at V0
NOP
LI T0 0x1
BEQ V0 T0 sameside
NOP
LI T0 0x3
BEQ V0 T0 sameside
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
ADDIU A1 R0 -5 ; Number of coins needed for event here. Remember to
; keep as negative number (so game will subtract coins).

; Display the coin change by the player stats
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
ADDIU A1 R0 -5 ; Number of coins needed for event here. Remember to
; keep as negative number (so game will subtract coins).

; Sleep for 30 frames to let coin change take effect
JAL SleepProcess
ADDIU A0 R0 30
NOP

LI A0 4 ; Assigns Happening fade-out
JAL InitFadeOut ; Fade to black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-out

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Sleep for 16 frames

LI S4 0
J removekeys
NOP

sameside:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

SW R0 20(SP) ; A4
SW R0 24(SP) ; A5
SW R0 28(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Boo
LUI A1 hi(SideSelection)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(SideSelection)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 0
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
LI A1 0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S0 V0 ; S0 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
LI A0 0
BEQ S0 A0 paycoins
NOP
LI A0 1
BEQ S0 A0 nocoins
NOP
LI A0 2
BEQ S0 A0 nocurse
NOP
LI A0 3
BEQ S0 A0 view_map2
NOP

view_map2:
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J sameside
NOP

paycoins:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player's Index at V0
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
LI A1 15 ; A1 = The minimum amount of Coins to shop
JAL PlayerHasCoins ; Checks if Player has the minimum Coins 
NOP

LI S3 1
BEQ V0 R0 cannotpay ; If the player doesn't have the Coins, exit
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
ADDIU A1 R0 -15 ; Number of coins needed for event here. Remember to
; keep as negative number (so game will subtract coins).

; Display the coin change by the player stats
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
ADDIU A1 R0 -15 ; Number of coins needed for event here. Remember to
; keep as negative number (so game will subtract coins).

; Sleep for 30 frames to let coin change take effect
JAL SleepProcess
ADDIU A0 R0 30
NOP

LI A0 4 ; Assigns Happening fade-out
JAL InitFadeOut ; Fade to black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-out

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Sleep for 16 frames

LI S3 0
LI S4 0
LI S0 0x1

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
BEQ S0 V0 p4check
NOP

LUI S1 hi(p2_item1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p2_item1) ; S1 is the address of Player 1's First Item

LI S0 0x01 ; Check for Skeleton Key
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 deletekeyp2paid
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 deletekeyp2paid
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 deletekeyp2paid
NOP

J failedcurse
NOP

deletekeyp2paid:
LI S0 0xFF ; S0 contains Empty Value
SB S0 0(S1) ; Place Empty Value into last-checked slot (Skeleton Key)
LI A0 0x1
JAL FixUpPlayerItemSlots
NOP
LI A0 0x1
JAL RefreshHUD
NOP

J cursed
NOP

cannotpay:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(cannotpaymsg)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(cannotpaymsg) ; This loads "leavemsg" into the Textbox
LI A2 0x0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
LI A3 0x0

; The rest here perform the "wait for confirmation"
; and probably messagebox teardown.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

BNE S3 R0 sameside
NOP

J exit
NOP

nocoins:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player's Index at V0
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
LI A1 5 ; A1 = The minimum amount of Coins to shop

NOP

LI S3 0
BEQ V0 R0 cannotpay ; If the player doesn't have the Coins, exit

ADDIU A0 V0 0

removekeys:

NOP

BEQ S0 S2 deletekeyp2

p4check:

BEQ S0 S2 deletekeyp4
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 deletekeyp4
NOP

cursecheck:

NOP

NOP

Next Space Setup.code:
; NAME: Next Space Setup
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Next
; PARAM: Space|Prev

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP

ADD A0 R0 V0 ; Assigns Current Player Index to A0
ADDIU A1 R0 Next_chain_index ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
ADDIU A2 R0 Next_chain_space_index ; Assigns Space Index to A2
JAL SetNextChainAndSpace 
NOP

LI A0 -1
ADDIU A1 R0 Prev_chain_index
ADDIU A2 R0 Prev_chain_space_index
JAL SetPrevChainAndSpace
NOP


LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

King Boo Carnival Ticket Booth v2.code:
; NAME: King Boo Carnival Ticket Booth v2
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Space

ADDIU SP SP -48
SW RA 44(SP)
SW S0 40(SP)
SW S2 32(SP)
SW S1 36(SP)
SW S3 28(SP)

;FIND CURRENT PLAYER START-------------------------------------------
LI A0 -1
LI A1 -1
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2

LI A0 Space_chain_index
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; Current Space Index at V0
LI A1 Space_chain_space_index

LI A0 -1 ; Current Player's Index
LI A1 10 ; Frames it takes to turn
JAL 0x800ED20C ; RotatePlayerModel
MOVE A2 V0 ; Space Index to face towards

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player Index at V0
NOP

LI S0 0x0 ; Start with Player 1 
LUI S1 hi(p1_item1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_item1) ; S1 is the address of Player 1's First Item

START:
BEQ S0 V0 checkslots
NOP

ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to check the next Player
ADDIU S1 S1 0x38 ; This makes it load the next Player's First Item
J START
NOP
;FIND CURRENT PLAYER END---------------------------------------------

;CHECK ITEM SLOTS START----------------------------------------------
checkslots:
ADDIU S0 R0 0xFF ; 0xFF = No Item Value
LBU S2 0(S1) ; S2 is the value of the item in the first slot
BEQ S0 S2 ticketbooth ; Go to ticketbooth if the first slot is empty
NOP
ADDIU S0 R0 0x01 ; 0x01 = Skeleton Key
BEQ S0 S2 haskey ; Go to haskey if first slot is Skeleton Key
NOP
ADDIU S0 R0 0xFF
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to check Slot #2
LBU S2 0(S1) ; S2 is the value of the item in the second slot
BEQ S0 S2 ticketbooth ; Go to ticketbooth if the second slot is empty
NOP
ADDIU S0 R0 0x01
BEQ S0 S2 haskey
NOP
ADDIU S0 R0 0xFF
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to check Slot #3
LBU S2 0(S1) ; S2 is the value of the item in the third slot
BEQ S0 S2 ticketbooth ; Go to itemmessage if the third slot is empty
NOP
ADDIU S0 R0 0x01
BEQ S0 S2 haskey
NOP
; If the Player has 3 Items, they'll get the "No Item" message
;CHECK ITEM SLOTS END------------------------------------------------

;NO ITEM MESSAGE DISPLAY START---------------------------------------
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(noitem)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(noitem) ; This loads "noitem" into the Textbox
LI A2 0x0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
LI A3 0x0

; The rest here perform the "wait for confirmation"
; and probably messagebox teardown.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J exit ; Player got no item, exit
NOP
;NO ITEM MESSAGE DISPLAY END-----------------------------------------

haskey:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(haskeymsg)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(haskeymsg) ; This loads "noitem" into the Textbox
LI A2 0x0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
LI A3 0x0

; The rest here perform the "wait for confirmation"
; and probably messagebox teardown.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J exit ; Player got no item, exit
NOP

ticketbooth:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player's Index at V0
NOP

MOVE S3 V0 ; Copy Current Player Index to S4
MOVE A0 S3 ; Copy Current Player Index to A0
LI A1 10 ; A1 = The minimum amount of Coins to shop
JAL PlayerHasCoins ; Checks if Player has the minimum Coins 
NOP

BEQ V0 R0 NoCoinsToShop ; If the player doesn't have the Coins, exit
NOP

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(givecoins)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(givecoins) ; This loads "noitem" into the Textbox
LI A2 0x0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
LI A3 0x0

; The rest here perform the "wait for confirmation"
; and probably messagebox teardown.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
ADDIU A1 R0 -10 ; Number of coins needed for event here. Remember to
; keep as negative number (so game will subtract coins).

; Display the coin change by the player stats
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
ADDIU A1 R0 -10 ; Number of coins needed for event here. Remember to
; keep as negative number (so game will subtract coins).

; Sleep for 30 frames to let coin change take effect
JAL SleepProcess
ADDIU A0 R0 30
NOP

LI S0 0x01 ; S0 contains Skeleton Key
SB S0 0(S1) ; Place Skeleton Key on empty Item slot

; 0x00 = Mushroom
; 0x01 = Skeleton Key
; 0x02 = Poison Mushroom
; 0x03 = Reverse Mushroom
; 0x04 = Cellular Shopper
; 0x05 = Warp Block
; 0x06 = Plunder Chest
; 0x07 = Bowser Phone
; 0x08 = Dueling Glove
; 0x09 = Lucky Lamp
; 0x0A = Golden Mushroom
; 0x0B = Boo Bell
; 0x0C = Boo Repellant
; 0x0D = Bowser Suit
; 0x0E = Magic Lamp
; 0x0F = Koopa Card
; 0x10 = Barter Box
; 0x11 = Lucky Coin
; 0x12 = Wacky Watch
;GIVE ITEM END-------------------------------------------------------

;SOUND START---------------------------------------------------------
LI A0 0x10C ; Turn Start Sound Index
; Use the Audio Player on PP64 to find other sound indexes to use
; Then use the following link to know what Sound Index you need
; https://pastebin.com/H1jxNFqr
JAL PlaySound 
NOP

ADDIU A0 R0 10 ; Number of frames the game waits for sound to finish
JAL SleepProcess 
NOP

J exit
NOP

NoCoinsToShop:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(nocoins)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(nocoins) ; This loads "noitem" into the Textbox
LI A2 0x0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
LI A3 0x0

; The rest here perform the "wait for confirmation"
; and probably messagebox teardown.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J exit ; Player got no item, exit
NOP

exit:
LW S3 28(SP)
LW S1 36(SP)
LW S2 32(SP)
LW S0 40(SP)
LW RA 44(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 48

.align 16

.ascii " I"
.byte 0x5C ; '
.ascii "ll let you in anyway"
.byte 0x85

; Here's a list of the most common bytes you'll need
; .byte 0x01 ; Black Font
; .byte 0x03 ; Red Font
; .byte 0x04 ; Purple Font
; .byte 0x05 ; Green Font
; .byte 0x06 ; Blue font
; .byte 0x07 ; Yellow Font
; .byte 0x08 ; White Font
; .byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
; .byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation Mark (!)
; .byte 0xC3 ; Question Mark (?)
; .byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
; .byte 0x0A ; New Line (Writes Below)
; .byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
; .byte 0x29 ; Coin icon
; .byte 0x3D ; - (minus)
; .byte 0x3E ; x (multiply)
; .byte 0xFF,0 ; FF=Pause

; If your message has an image, use this at the start of each line
; .byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for picture

King Boo Carnival Prize Exchange v2.code:
; NAME: King Boo Carnival Prize Exchange v2
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Space
; PARAM: Space|CurrentSpace

ADDIU SP SP -56
SW S0 48(SP)
SW S1 44(SP)
SW S2 40(SP)
SW S3 36(SP)
SW S4 32(SP)
SW RA 52(SP)

LI A0 -1
LI A1 -1
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2

LI A0 Space_chain_index
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; Current Space Index at V0
LI A1 Space_chain_space_index

LI A0 -1 ; Current Player's Index
LI A1 10 ; Frames it takes to turn
JAL 0x800ED20C ; RotatePlayerModel
MOVE A2 V0 ; Space Index to face towards

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Character image (Boo)
LUI A1 hi(Greeting_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Greeting_Message)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP
;END GREETING=========================================================

;BEGIN ITEM SELECTION PROMPT==========================================
START:
SW R0 20(SP) ; A4
SW R0 24(SP) ; A5
SW R0 28(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (Boo)
LUI A1 hi(ItemSelection_Prompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ItemSelection_Prompt)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
J AILogic
NOP
AISelect:
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 S4 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S0 V0 ; S0 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
LI A0 0
BEQ S0 A0 item1
NOP
LI A0 1
BEQ S0 A0 item2
NOP
LI A0 2
BEQ S0 A0 item3
NOP
LI A0 3
BEQ S0 A0 exit
NOP
LI A0 4
BEQ S0 A0 view_map
NOP
;END ITEM SELECTION PROMPT============================================

;BEGIN Item Values====================================================
; 0x00 = Mushroom
; 0x01 = Skeleton Key
; 0x02 = Poison Mushroom
; 0x03 = Reverse Mushroom
; 0x04 = Cellular Shopper
; 0x05 = Warp Block
; 0x06 = Plunder Chest
; 0x07 = Bowser Phone
; 0x08 = Dueling Glove
; 0x09 = Lucky Lamp
; 0x0A = Golden Mushroom
; 0x0B = Boo Bell
; 0x0C = Boo Repellant
; 0x0D = Bowser Suit
; 0x0E = Magic Lamp
; 0x0F = Koopa Card
; 0x10 = Barter Box
; 0x11 = Lucky Coin
; 0x12 = Wacky Watch
;END Item Values======================================================

item1:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player Index at V0
NOP
MOVE S3 V0

LI S0 0x0 ; Start with Player 1 
LUI S1 hi(p1_item1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_item1) ; S1 is the address of Player 1's First Item

item1check:
BEQ S0 V0 checkslots1
NOP

ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to check the next Player
ADDIU S1 S1 0x38 ; This makes it load the next Player's First Item
J item1check
NOP

checkslots1:
ADDIU S0 R0 0x01
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 getcoins
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 getcoins
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 getcoins
NOP

J failedcheck
NOP

getcoins:
LI S0 0xFF ; S0 contains Empty Value
SB S0 0(S1) ; Place Empty Value into last-checked slot (Skeleton Key)
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE S3 V0
MOVE A0 S3
JAL FixUpPlayerItemSlots
NOP
MOVE A0 S3
JAL RefreshHUD
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player Index at V0
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual ; Adjusts the player's coins
ADDIU A1 R0 10

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange ; Shows the +coins effect
ADDIU A1 R0 10

JAL SleepProcess ; Waits 30 frames for game to show coin change
ADDIU A0 R0 30
NOP

J goodexitone ; Player got coins, exit
NOP

failedcheck:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Character image (Boo)
LUI A1 hi(nokeymsg)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(nokeymsg)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J START
NOP

item2:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player Index at V0
NOP
MOVE S3 V0

LI S0 0x0 ; Start with Player 1 
LUI S1 hi(p1_item1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_item1) ; S1 is the address of Player 1's First Item

item2check:
BEQ S0 V0 checkslots2
NOP

ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to check the next Player
ADDIU S1 S1 0x38 ; This makes it load the next Player's First Item
J item2check
NOP

checkslots2:
ADDIU S0 R0 0x01
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 2ndcheckslots2slot1
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 2ndcheckslots2slot2
NOP

J failedcheck
NOP

2ndcheckslots2slot1:
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 getshroomslot2
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 getshroomslot3
NOP

J failedcheck
NOP

2ndcheckslots2slot2:
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 getshroomslot3
NOP

J failedcheck
NOP

getshroomslot2:
LI S0 0xFF
SB S0 0(S1)
MOVE A0 S3
JAL FixUpPlayerItemSlots
NOP
MOVE A0 S3
JAL RefreshHUD
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
LI S0 0x0 ; Start with Player 1 
LUI S1 hi(p1_item1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_item1) ; S1 is the address of Player 1's First Item
getshroomslot2to1:
BEQ S0 V0 getshroomslot1
NOP
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to check the next Player
ADDIU S1 S1 0x38 ; This makes it load the next Player's First Item
J getshroomslot2to1
NOP

getshroomslot1:
LI S0 0x0A
SB S0 0(S1)
LI A0 0x10C ; Turn Start Sound Index
; Use the Audio Player on PP64 to find other sound indexes to use
; Then use the following link to know what Sound Index you need
; https://pastebin.com/H1jxNFqr
JAL PlaySound 
NOP
ADDIU A0 R0 0 ; Number of frames the game waits for sound to finish
JAL SleepProcess 
NOP
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE S3 V0
MOVE A0 S3
JAL FixUpPlayerItemSlots
NOP
MOVE A0 S3
JAL RefreshHUD
NOP

J goodexitone
NOP

getshroomslot3:
LI S0 0xFF
SB S0 0(S1)
MOVE A0 S3
JAL FixUpPlayerItemSlots
NOP
MOVE A0 S3
JAL RefreshHUD
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
LI S0 0x0 ; Start with Player 1 
LUI S1 hi(p1_item1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_item1) ; S1 is the address of Player 1's First Item
getshroomslot3to1:
BEQ S0 V0 getshroomslot1or2
NOP
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to check the next Player
ADDIU S1 S1 0x38 ; This makes it load the next Player's First Item
J getshroomslot3to1
NOP

getshroomslot1or2:
ADDIU S0 R0 0x01
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 getshroomslot1
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 getshroomslot1
NOP

item3:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player Index at V0
NOP
MOVE S3 V0

LI S0 0x0 ; Start with Player 1 
LUI S1 hi(p1_item1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_item1) ; S1 is the address of Player 1's First Item

item3check:
BEQ S0 V0 checkslots3
NOP

ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to check the next Player
ADDIU S1 S1 0x38 ; This makes it load the next Player's First Item
J item3check
NOP

checkslots3:
ADDIU S0 R0 0x01
LBU S2 0(S1)
BNE S0 S2 failedcheck
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BNE S0 S2 failedcheck
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BNE S0 S2 failedcheck
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
LI S0 0x0 ; Start with Player 1 
LUI S1 hi(p1_item1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_item1) ; S1 is the address of Player 1's First Item
getstarslot3to1:
BEQ S0 V0 getstarslot1
NOP
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to check the next Player
ADDIU S1 S1 0x38 ; This makes it load the next Player's First Item
J getstarslot3to1
NOP

getstarslot1:
LI S0 0xFF
SB S0 0(S1)
ADDIU S1 S1 1
SB S0 0(S1)
ADDIU S1 S1 1
SB S0 0(S1)

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE S3 V0
MOVE A0 S3
JAL FixUpPlayerItemSlots
NOP
MOVE A0 S3
JAL RefreshHUD
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player Index at V0
NOP

LI S0 0x0 ; Start with Player 1 
LUI S1 hi(p1_stars)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_stars) ; S1 is the address of Player 1's Stars

STARTgivestar:
BEQ S0 V0 givestar 
NOP

ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to check the next Player
ADDIU S1 S1 0x38 ; This makes it load the next Player's Stars
J STARTgivestar
NOP
;FIND CURRENT PLAYER END---------------------------------------------

;GIVE STAR START-----------------------------------------------------
givestar:
LB S2 0(S1) ; Load Player's Star count into S2
ADDIU S2 S2 1 ; Add 1 to their Star count
SB S2 0(S1) ; Insert new Star count into the address
;GIVE STAR END-------------------------------------------------------

;SOUND START---------------------------------------------------------
LI A0 CurrentSpace_chain_index
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; Current Space Index at V0
LI A1 CurrentSpace_chain_space_index

LI A0 -1 ; Current Player's Index
LI A1  1 ; Frames it takes to turn
JAL 0x800ED20C ; RotatePlayerModel
MOVE A2 V0 ; Space Index to face towards

LI A0 -1 ; Current Player
LI A1 6 ; Animation Index (Star Get Dance)
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Loop Animation

JAL PlayMusic
LI A0 111 ; Star Get Jingle

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE S3 V0
MOVE A0 S3
LUI T1 hi(p1_char)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(p1_char) ; Load Player 1's Character address
LI T0 0x38 ; Distance between each player's Character address
MULT A0 T0 ;  Multiply Current Player Index by S3
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to S3

ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get current Player's Star address
LBU T0 0(T1) ; Load address value into S2

ADDIU V0 T0 0x263 ; Mario's Despair Index

JAL PlaySound
MOVE A0 V0
NOP

JAL SleepProcess 
LI A0 110 ; Number of frames the game waits for sound to finish

JAL GetBoardAudioIndex ; Original Board Audio Index at V0
NOP

JAL PlayMusic
MOVE A0 V0

J goodexittwo
NOP

view_map:
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J START
NOP

goodexitone:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE S3 V0
MOVE A0 S3
LUI T1 hi(p1_char)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(p1_char) ; Load Player 1's Character address
LI T0 0x38 ; Distance between each player's Character address
MULT A0 T0 ;  Multiply Current Player Index by S3
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to S3

ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get current Player's Star address
LBU T0 0(T1) ; Load address value into S2

ADDIU V0 T0 0x2BE ; Mario's Despair Index

JAL PlaySound
MOVE A0 V0
NOP

LI A0 -1 ; Player Index (Current Player)
LI A1 5 ; Animation Index (Star)
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40

goodexittwo:
LI A0 -1
LI A1 -1
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2

LI A0 Space_chain_index
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; Current Space Index at V0
LI A1 Space_chain_space_index

LI A0 -1 ; Current Player's Index
LI A1 10 ; Frames it takes to turn
JAL 0x800ED20C ; RotatePlayerModel
MOVE A2 V0 ; Space Index to face towards

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Character image (Boo)
LUI A1 hi(ByeMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ByeMessage)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J exit
NOP

exit:
LW S0 48(SP)
LW S1 44(SP)
LW S2 40(SP)
LW S3 36(SP)
LW S4 32(SP)
LW RA 52(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 56

.byte 0x0A ; Newline

.byte 0x0D ; End option
.byte 0x0A ; Newline
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Little more for option indent
.byte 0x0C ; Start option
.ascii "Trade in for a"
.byte 0x06 ; Blue font
.ascii " Golden Mushroom"
.byte 0x08
.byte 0x0D ; End option
.byte 0x0A ; Newline
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Little more for option indent
.byte 0x0C ; Start option
.ascii "Trade in for a"
.byte 0x07 ; Yellow font
.ascii " Star"
.byte 0x08
.byte 0x0D ; End option
.byte 0x0A ; Newline
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A

.byte 0x0D ; End option
.byte 0x0A ; Newline
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A 
.byte 0x0C ; Start option
.ascii "View map"
.byte 0x0D ; End option
.byte 0

.align 16
nokeymsg:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A
.ascii "You don"
.byte 0x5C
.ascii "t have enough"
.byte 0x06
.ascii " tickets"
.byte 0x08
.byte 0xC2
.byte 0x0A
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A
.ascii "Come back when you"
.byte 0x5C
.ascii "ve collected a"
.byte 0x0A
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A
.byte 0x06
.ascii "Skeleton Key"
.byte 0x08
.byte 0x85
.byte 0xFF,0

.align 16
ByeMessage:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A
.ascii "Thank you for your patronage"
.byte 0xC2
.byte 0x0A
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A
.ascii "Hope you have fun at King Boo Carnival"
.byte 0xC2
.byte 0xFF,0

.align 4
AILogic:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player Index at V0
NOP

LI S0 0x0 ; Start with Player 1 
LUI S1 hi(p1_item1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_item1) ; S1 is the address of Player 1's First Item

loop:
BEQ S0 V0 endloop
NOP

ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to check the next Player
ADDIU S1 S1 0x38 ; This makes it load the next Player's First Item
J loop
NOP

endloop:
LI S4 3
ADDIU S0 R0 0x01
LBU S2 0(S1)
BNE S0 S2 endloop2
NOP
ADDIU S4 S4 1

endloop2:
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BNE S0 S2 endloop3
NOP
ADDIU S4 S4 1

endloop3:
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BNE S0 S2 Tally
NOP
ADDIU S4 S4 1
J Tally
NOP

Tally:
LI T0 3
BEQ S4 T0 SelectExit
NOP
LI T0 6
BEQ S4 T0 Correction
NOP
LI T0 5
BEQ S4 T0 ThreeWays
NOP

JAL GetRandomByte
NOP
SLTI S0 V0 0x80
NOP
BEQ S0 R0 SelectExit
NOP
J Correction
NOP

ThreeWays:
JAL GetRandomByte
NOP
SLTI S0 V0 0x55
NOP
BEQ S0 R0 SelectExit
NOP
SLTI S0 V0 0xAB
NOP
BEQ S0 R0 Correction
NOP
ADDIU S4 S4 -1

Correction:
ADDIU S4 S4 -4
J AISelect
NOP

SelectExit:
LI S4 3
J AISelect
NOP

King Boo Carnival Shop v2.code:
; NAME: King Boo Carnival Shop v2
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: +Number|MinToShop
; PARAM: +Number|MushroomPrice
; PARAM: +Number|PlunderChestPrice
; PARAM: +Number|DuelingGlovePrice
; PARAM: +Number|GoldenMushroomPrice
; PARAM: +Number|BooBellPrice
; PARAM: +Number|BowserSuitPrice
; PARAM: +Number|MagicLampPrice
; PARAM: +Number|ItemBagPrice
; PARAM: Space|Space

;====================================================================
; IMPORTANT: This code is specifically designed to allow the landing
;            or passing player to purchase an item from an inventory
;            of your choice. If the player's inventory is full, they
;            don't get to buy anything.
;===================================================================

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S1 32(SP)
SW S2 28(SP)
SW S0 24(SP)
SW S3 20(SP)
SW S4 16(SP)
SW S6 12(SP)
SW S5 8(SP)

LI A0 -1
LI A1 -1
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2

LI A0 Space_chain_index
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; Current Space Index at V0
LI A1 Space_chain_space_index

LI A0 -1 ; Current Player's Index
LI A1 10 ; Frames it takes to turn
JAL 0x800ED20C ; RotatePlayerModel
MOVE A2 V0 ; Space Index to face towards

;BEGIN Checks that prevent purchase===================================
LUI S1 hi(total_turns)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(total_turns) ; Load address of Total Turns to S1
LBU S1 0(S1) ; Load value of Total Turns to S1

LUI S2 hi(current_turn)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(current_turn) ; Load address of Current Turn to S2
LBU S2 0(S2) ; Load value of Current Turn to S2

BEQ S2 S1 LastTurn ; If it's the last turn, branch
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player's Index at V0
NOP

MOVE S4 V0 ; Copy Current Player Index to S4
MOVE A0 S4 ; Copy Current Player Index to A0
LI A1 MinToShop ; A1 = The minimum amount of Coins to shop
JAL PlayerHasCoins ; Checks if Player has the minimum Coins 
NOP

BEQ V0 R0 NoCoinsToShop ; If the player doesn't have the Coins, exit
NOP

LUI S1 hi(p1_item3)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_item3) ; Load Player 1's Item slot #3 address
LI S3 0x38 ; This is the distance between each player's Item #3
MULT S4 S3 ;  Multiply Current Player Index by S3
MFLO S3 ; Move the result to S3

ADDU S1 S1 S3 ; Add result to get current Player's item slot #3
LBU S2 0(S1) ; Load address value into S2

LI T0 0xFF ; No Item Value
BNE S2 T0 TooManyItems ; If the player's inventory is full, exit
NOP
;END Checks that prevent purchase=====================================

;BEGIN GREETING=======================================================
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Character image (Boo)
LUI A1 hi(Greeting_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Greeting_Message)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP
;END GREETING=========================================================

;BEGIN ITEM SELECTION PROMPT==========================================
START:
SW R0 20(SP) ; A4
SW R0 24(SP) ; A5
SW R0 28(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (Boo)
LUI A1 hi(ItemSelection_Prompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ItemSelection_Prompt)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
J AILogic
NOP
AISelect:
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 S6 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S0 V0 ; S0 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
LI A0 0
BEQ S0 A0 item1
NOP
LI A0 1
BEQ S0 A0 item2
NOP
LI A0 2
BEQ S0 A0 item3
NOP
LI A0 3
BEQ S0 A0 item4
NOP
LI A0 4
BEQ S0 A0 item5
NOP
LI A0 5
BEQ S0 A0 item6
NOP
LI A0 6
BEQ S0 A0 item7
NOP
LI A0 7
BEQ S0 A0 itembag
NOP
LI A0 8
BEQ S0 A0 exit
NOP
LI A0 9
BEQ S0 A0 view_map
NOP
;END ITEM SELECTION PROMPT============================================

;BEGIN Item Values====================================================
; 0x00 = Mushroom
; 0x01 = Skeleton Key
; 0x02 = Poison Mushroom
; 0x03 = Reverse Mushroom
; 0x04 = Cellular Shopper
; 0x05 = Warp Block
; 0x06 = Plunder Chest
; 0x07 = Bowser Phone
; 0x08 = Dueling Glove
; 0x09 = Lucky Lamp
; 0x0A = Golden Mushroom
; 0x0B = Boo Bell
; 0x0C = Boo Repellant
; 0x0D = Bowser Suit
; 0x0E = Magic Lamp
; 0x0F = Koopa Card
; 0x10 = Barter Box
; 0x11 = Lucky Coin
; 0x12 = Wacky Watch
;END Item Values======================================================

;BEGIN Selected Option================================================
item1:
LI S0 0x00 ; Mushroom Value
LI S3 MushroomPrice ; S3 contains Mushroom Price
J payprice
NOP
item2:
LI S0 0x06 ; Plunder Chest Value
LI S3 PlunderChestPrice ; S3 contains Plunder Chest Price
J payprice
NOP
item3:
LI S0 0x08 ; Dueling Glove Value
LI S3 DuelingGlovePrice ; S3 contains Dueling Glove Price
J payprice
NOP
item4:
LI S0 0x0A ; Golden Mushroom Value
LI S3 GoldenMushroomPrice ; S3 contains Golden Mushroom Price
J payprice
NOP
item5:
LI S0 0x0B ; Boo Bell value
LI S3 BooBellPrice ; S3 containes Boo Bell Price
J payprice
NOP
item6:
LI S0 0x0D ; Bowser Suit Value
LI S3 BowserSuitPrice ; S3 contains Bowser Suit Price
J payprice
NOP
item7:
LI S0 0x0E ; Magic Lamp Value
LI S3 MagicLampPrice ; S3 contains Magic Lamp Price
J payprice
NOP
itembag:
LI S3 ItemBagPrice ; S3 contains Item Bag Price
MOVE A0 S4 ; Current Player's Index moved to A0
MOVE A1 S3 ; Amount of coins to check
JAL PlayerHasCoins ; Checks if Player has A1's amount of Coins
NOP

BEQ V0 R0 NotEnoughCoins ; If insufficient funds, branch
NOP

MOVE A0 S4 ; Current Player's Index moved to A0
SUBU A1 R0 S3 ; Amount to pay
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual ; Changes Player's coin amount
NOP

MOVE A0 S4 ; Current Player's Index moved to A0
SUBU A1 R0 S3 ; Amount to display
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange ; Displays Player's coin loss on-screen 
NOP

ADDIU A0 R0 30
JAL SleepProcess ; Sleeps for 30 frames
NOP

LI T1 2 
SUBU S1 S1 T1 ; This loads the current player's first Item address
LI S5 1 ; S5 is the counter to stop giving Items once full
Loop:
LI T0 0x4
SLT A2 S5 T0 ; A2 = 1 if S5 is less than 4
NOP
BEQ A2 R0 exiting ; exit once player's item inventory is full
NOP

LBU S2 0(S1) ; Load slot #1's Item Value into S2
LI T1 0xFF ; No Item Value
BNE S2 T1 next ; If the player has an item, load next address
NOP

JAL GetRandomByte ; Integer at V0
NOP

SLTI S0 V0 0x6 ; S0 = 1 if the number is less than 6
NOP
BNE S0 R0 getKoopaKard ; Branch if true
NOP

SLTI S0 V0 0xF ; S0 = 1 if the number is less than 15
NOP
BNE S0 R0 getSkeletonKey ; Branch if true
NOP

SLTI S0 V0 0x21 ; S0 = 1 if the number is less than 33
NOP
BNE S0 R0 getBooBell ; Branch if true
NOP

SLTI S0 V0 0x33 ; S0 = 1 if the number is less than 51
NOP
BNE S0 R0 getBooRepellant ; Branch if true
NOP

SLTI S0 V0 0x45 ; S0 = 1 if the number is less than 69
NOP
BNE S0 R0 getPlunderChest ; Branch if true
NOP

SLTI S0 V0 0x74 ; S0 = 1 if the number is less than 116
NOP
BNE S0 R0 getLuckyLamp ; Branch if true
NOP

SLTI S0 V0 0xA3 ; S0 = 1 if the number is less than 163
NOP
BNE S0 R0 getCellularShopper ; Branch if true
NOP

SLTI S0 V0 0xD2 ; S0 = 1 if the number is less than 210
NOP
BNE S0 R0 getMushroom ; Branch if true
NOP

J getPoisonMushroom
NOP

getKoopaKard:
LI T0 0x0F ; Koopa Kard value
SB T0 0(S1)
J sound
NOP

getSkeletonKey:
LI T0 0x01 ; Skeleton Key value
SB T0 0(S1)
J sound
NOP

getBooBell:
LI T0 0x0B ; Boo Bell value
SB T0 0(S1)
J sound
NOP

getBooRepellant:
LI T0 0x0C ; Boo Repellant value
SB T0 0(S1)
J sound
NOP

getPlunderChest:
LI T0 0x06 ; Plunder Chest value
SB T0 0(S1)
J sound
NOP

getLuckyLamp:
LI T0 0x09 ; Lucky Lamp value
SB T0 0(S1)
J sound
NOP

getCellularShopper:
LI T0 0x04 ; Cellular Shopper value
SB T0 0(S1)
J sound
NOP

getMushroom:
LI T0 0x00 ; Mushroom value
SB T0 0(S1)
J sound
NOP

getPoisonMushroom:
LI T0 0x02 ; Poison Mushroom value
SB T0 0(S1)

sound:
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 R0 0x10C ; Turn Start sound

ADDIU A0 R0 30
JAL SleepProcess ; Sleeps for 30 frames
NOP

next:
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Load next item's address
ADDIU S5 S5 1 ; Raise the item counter by 1
J Loop ; Loop back to give the next item
NOP

view_map:
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J START
NOP
;END Item Values======================================================

;BEGIN Checking Player For Necessary Coins To Purchase================
payprice:
MOVE A0 S4 ; Current Player's Index moved to A0
MOVE A1 S3 ; Amount of coins to check
JAL PlayerHasCoins ; Checks if Player has A1's amount of Coins
NOP

BEQ V0 R0 NotEnoughCoins ; If insufficient funds, branch
NOP
;END Checking Player For Necessary Coins To Purchase==================

;BEGIN Taking Coins From Player=======================================
MOVE A0 S4 ; Current Player's Index moved to A0
SUBU A1 R0 S3 ; Amount to pay
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual ; Changes Player's coin amount
NOP

MOVE A0 S4 ; Current Player's Index moved to A0
SUBU A1 R0 S3 ; Amount to display
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange ; Displays Player's coin loss on-screen 
NOP

ADDIU A0 R0 30
JAL SleepProcess ; Sleeps for 30 frames
NOP
;END Taking Coins From Player=========================================

;BEGIN Checking Player Item Slots=====================================
LI T1 2
SUBU S1 S1 T1 ; This loads the current player's first Item address
LBU S2 0(S1) ; Load slot #1's Item Value into S2
LI T1 0xFF ; No Item Value
BEQ S2 T1 giveitem ; Go to giveitem if the slot is empty
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to load current player's second Item address
LBU S2 0(S1) ; Load slot #2's Item Value into S2
BEQ S2 T1 giveitem ; Go to giveitem if the slot is empty
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to load current player's third Item address

giveitem:
SB S0 0(S1)
;END Checking Player Item Slots=======================================

;BEGIN Item Sound Effect==============================================
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x10C ; Turn Start sound

exiting:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE S4 V0
MOVE A0 S4
LUI T1 hi(p1_char)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(p1_char) ; Load Player 1's Character address
LI T0 0x38 ; Distance between each player's Character address
MULT A0 T0 ;  Multiply Current Player Index by S3
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to S3

ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get current Player's Star address
LBU T0 0(T1) ; Load address value into S2

ADDIU V0 T0 0x2BE ; Mario's Despair Index

JAL PlaySound
MOVE A0 V0
NOP

LI A0 -1 ; Player Index (Current Player)
LI A1 5 ; Animation Index (Star)
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40

J exit
NOP
;END Item Sound Effect================================================

;BEGIN CANNOT BUY ITEM MESSAGE========================================
NotEnoughCoins:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Character image (Boo)
LUI A1 hi(NotEnoughCoins_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(NotEnoughCoins_Message)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J START
NOP
;END CANNOT BUY ITEM MESSAGE==========================================

;BEGIN TOO MANY ITEMS MESSAGE=========================================
TooManyItems:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Character image (Boo)
LUI A1 hi(TooManyItems_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(TooManyItems_Message)

J FinalizeMessage
NOP
;END TOO MANY ITEMS MESSAGE===========================================

;BEGIN NOT ENOUGH COINS MESSAGE=======================================
NoCoinsToShop:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Character image (Boo)
LUI A1 hi(NoCoinsToShop_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(NoCoinsToShop_Message)

J FinalizeMessage
NOP
;END NOT ENOUGH COINS MESSAGE=========================================

;BEGIN Last Turn MESSAGE==============================================
LastTurn:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Character image (Boo)
LUI A1 hi(LastTurn_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(LastTurn_Message)
;END Last Turn MESSAGE================================================

FinalizeMessage:
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP



exit:
LW S5 8(SP)
LW S6 12(SP)
LW S4 16(SP)
LW S3 20(SP)
LW S1 32(SP)
LW S2 28(SP)
LW S0 24(SP)
LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

NOP

MOVE A0 S4 ; Copy Current Player Index to A0
LI A1 30 ; A1 = The minimum amount of Coins to shop

King Boo Carnival Magic Show v2.code:
; NAME: King Boo Carnival Magic Show v2
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Space

ADDIU SP SP -56
SW RA 52(SP)
SW S0 48(SP)
SW S1 44(SP)
SW S2 40(SP)
SW S3 36(SP)
SW S4 32(SP)

LI A0 Space_chain_index
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; Current Space Index at V0
LI A1 Space_chain_space_index

LI A0 -1 ; Current Player's Index
LI A1 10 ; Frames it takes to turn
JAL 0x800ED20C ; RotatePlayerModel
MOVE A2 V0 ; Space Index to face towards

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player's Index at V0
NOP

MOVE S4 V0 ; Copy Current Player Index to S4
LUI S1 hi(p1_item1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_item1) ; Load Player 1's Item slot #3 address
LI S3 0x38 ; This is the distance between each player's Item #3
MULT S4 S3 ;  Multiply Current Player Index by S3
MFLO S3 ; Move the result to S3

ADDU S1 S1 S3 ; Add result to get current Player's item slot #1
LBU S2 0(S1) ; Load address value into S2

LI T0 0xFF ; No Item Value
BEQ S2 T0 NoItems ; If the player's inventory is full, exit
NOP

START:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

SW R0 20(SP) ; A4
SW R0 24(SP) ; A5
SW R0 28(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Boo
LUI A1 hi(ItemSelection_Prompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ItemSelection_Prompt)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 0
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
LI A1 0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S0 V0 ; S0 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
LI A0 0
BEQ S0 A0 kamek
NOP
LI A0 1
BEQ S0 A0 boo
NOP
LI A0 2
BEQ S0 A0 leave
NOP
LI A0 3
BEQ S0 A0 view_map
NOP

view_map:
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J START
NOP

kamek:
LI A0 4 ; Assigns Happening fade-out
JAL InitFadeOut ; Fade to black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-out

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Sleep for 16 frames

LI A0 0x143 ; Turn Start Sound Index
JAL PlaySound 
NOP

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 20

LI A0 4 ; Assigns Happening fade-in
JAL InitFadeIn
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-in

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Sleep for 16 frames

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player's Index at V0
NOP

MOVE S4 V0 ; Copy Current Player Index to S4
LUI S1 hi(p1_item1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_item1) ; Load Player 1's Item slot #1 address
LI S3 0x38 ; This is the distance between each player's Item #3
MULT S4 S3 ;  Multiply Current Player Index by S3
MFLO S3 ; Move the result to S3

ADDU S1 S1 S3 ; Add result to get current Player's item slot #1
LBU S2 0(S1) ; Load address value into S2

LI S0 0xFF ; S0 contains Empty Value
SB S0 0(S1) ; Place Empty Value into last-checked slot (Skeleton Key)
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE A0 S4
JAL FixUpPlayerItemSlots
NOP
MOVE A0 S4
JAL RefreshHUD
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player Index at V0
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual ; Adjusts the player's coins
ADDIU A1 R0 13

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange ; Shows the +coins effect
ADDIU A1 R0 13

JAL SleepProcess ; Waits 30 frames for game to show coin change
ADDIU A0 R0 30
NOP

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(kamekmsg)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(kamekmsg) ; This loads "noitem" into the Textbox
LI A2 0x0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
LI A3 0x0

; The rest here perform the "wait for confirmation"
; and probably messagebox teardown.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J exit ; Player got no item, exit
NOP

boo:
LI A0 4 ; Assigns Happening fade-out
JAL InitFadeOut ; Fade to black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-out

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Sleep for 16 frames

LI A0 0x143 ; Turn Start Sound Index
JAL PlaySound 
NOP

ADDIU A0 R0 20 ; Number of frames the game waits for sound to finish
JAL SleepProcess 
NOP

JAL GetRandomByte ; Integer at V0
NOP

LI A0 0x40
SLT S0 V0 A0 ; S0 = 1 if the number is less than 64
NOP
BNE S0 R0 boo1 ; Branch if true
NOP

LI A0 0x80
SLT S0 V0 A0 ; S0 = 1 if the number is less than 128
NOP
BNE S0 R0 boo2 ; Branch if true
NOP

LI A0 0xC0
SLT S0 V0 A0 ; S0 = 1 if the number is less than 192
NOP
BNE S0 R0 boo3 ; Branch if true
NOP

J boo4
NOP

King Boo Carnival Gachapon v2.code:
; NAME: King Boo Carnival Gachapon v2
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Space

ADDIU SP SP -48
SW S0 40(SP)
SW S1 36(SP)
SW S2 32(SP)
SW RA 44(SP)

LI A0 -1
LI A1 -1
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2

LI A0 Space_chain_index
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; Current Space Index at V0
LI A1 Space_chain_space_index

LI A0 -1 ; Current Player's Index
LI A1 10 ; Frames it takes to turn
JAL 0x800ED20C ; RotatePlayerModel
MOVE A2 V0 ; Space Index to face towards

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player's Index at V0
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
LI A1 5 ; A1 = The minimum amount of Coins to shop
JAL PlayerHasCoins ; Checks if Player has the minimum Coins 
NOP

BEQ V0 R0 NoCoinsToShop ; If the player doesn't have the Coins, exit
NOP

START:
SW R0 20(SP) ; A4
SW R0 24(SP) ; A5
SW R0 28(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 -1 ; No image
LUI A1 hi(ItemSelection_Prompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ItemSelection_Prompt)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 0
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
LI A1 0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S0 V0 ; S0 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
LI A0 0
BEQ S0 A0 play
NOP
LI A0 1
BEQ S0 A0 exit
NOP
LI A0 2
BEQ S0 A0 view_map
NOP

view_map:
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J START
NOP

play:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
ADDIU A1 R0 -5 ; Number of coins needed for event here. Remember to
; keep as negative number (so game will subtract coins).

; Display the coin change by the player stats
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
ADDIU A1 R0 -5 ; Number of coins needed for event here. Remember to
; keep as negative number (so game will subtract coins).

; Sleep for 30 frames to let coin change take effect
JAL SleepProcess
ADDIU A0 R0 30
NOP

JAL GetRandomByte ; Integer at V0
NOP

LI A0 0x10
SLT S0 V0 A0 ; S0 = 1 if the number is less than 16
NOP
BNE S0 R0 get10coins ; Branch if true
NOP

LI A0 0x60
SLT S0 V0 A0 ; S0 = 1 if the number is less than 96
NOP
BNE S0 R0 get5coins ; Branch if true
NOP

LI A0 0xA0
SLT S0 V0 A0 ; S0 = 1 if the number is less than 160
NOP
BNE S0 R0 getkey ; Branch if true
NOP

LI A0 0xC0
SLT S0 V0 A0 ; S0 = 1 if the number is less than 192
NOP
BNE S0 R0 getcapsule ; Branch if true
NOP

LI A0 0xE0
SLT S0 V0 A0 ; S0 = 1 if the number is less than 224
NOP
BNE S0 R0 getdango ; Branch if true
NOP

J getnothing
NOP

get10coins:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 -1 ; No image
LUI A1 hi(tencoins)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(tencoins)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
ADDIU A1 R0 10 ; Number of coins needed for event here. Remember to
; keep as negative number (so game will subtract coins).

; Display the coin change by the player stats
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
ADDIU A1 R0 10 ; Number of coins needed for event here. Remember to
; keep as negative number (so game will subtract coins).

; Sleep for 30 frames to let coin change take effect
JAL SleepProcess
ADDIU A0 R0 30
NOP

J goodexit
NOP

get5coins:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 -1 ; No image
LUI A1 hi(fivecoins)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(fivecoins)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
ADDIU A1 R0 5 ; Number of coins needed for event here. Remember to
; keep as negative number (so game will subtract coins).

; Display the coin change by the player stats
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
ADDIU A1 R0 5 ; Number of coins needed for event here. Remember to
; keep as negative number (so game will subtract coins).

; Sleep for 30 frames to let coin change take effect
JAL SleepProcess
ADDIU A0 R0 30
NOP

J goodexit
NOP

getkey:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player Index at V0
NOP

LI S0 0x0 ; Start with Player 1 
LUI S1 hi(p1_item1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_item1) ; S1 is the address of Player 1's First Item

STARTcheck:
BEQ S0 V0 checkslots
NOP

ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to check the next Player
ADDIU S1 S1 0x38 ; This makes it load the next Player's First Item
J STARTcheck
NOP

checkslots:
ADDIU S0 R0 0xFF ; 0xFF = No Item Value
LBU S2 0(S1) ; S2 is the value of the item in the first slot
BEQ S0 S2 gotkey ; Go to itemmessage if the first slot is empty
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to check Slot #2
LBU S2 0(S1) ; S2 is the value of the item in the second slot
BEQ S0 S2 gotkey ; Go to itemmessage if the second slot is empty
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to check Slot #3
LBU S2 0(S1) ; S2 is the value of the item in the third slot
BEQ S0 S2 gotkey ; Go to itemmessage if the third slot is empty
NOP

J getnothing
NOP

gotkey:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 -1 ; No image
LUI A1 hi(key)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(key)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LI S0 0x01 ; S0 contains Skeleton Key
SB S0 0(S1) ; Place Skeleton Key on empty Item slot

; 0x00 = Mushroom
; 0x01 = Skeleton Key
; 0x02 = Poison Mushroom
; 0x03 = Reverse Mushroom
; 0x04 = Cellular Shopper
; 0x05 = Warp Block
; 0x06 = Plunder Chest
; 0x07 = Bowser Phone
; 0x08 = Dueling Glove
; 0x09 = Lucky Lamp
; 0x0A = Golden Mushroom
; 0x0B = Boo Bell
; 0x0C = Boo Repellant
; 0x0D = Bowser Suit
; 0x0E = Magic Lamp
; 0x0F = Koopa Card
; 0x10 = Barter Box
; 0x11 = Lucky Coin
; 0x12 = Wacky Watch
;GIVE ITEM END-------------------------------------------------------

;SOUND START---------------------------------------------------------
LI A0 0x10C ; Turn Start Sound Index
; Use the Audio Player on PP64 to find other sound indexes to use
; Then use the following link to know what Sound Index you need
; https://pastebin.com/H1jxNFqr
JAL PlaySound 
NOP

ADDIU A0 R0 0 ; Number of frames the game waits for sound to finish
JAL SleepProcess 
NOP

J goodexit
NOP

getcapsule:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 -1 ; No image
LUI A1 hi(capsule)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(capsule)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J exit
NOP

getdango:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 -1 ; No image
LUI A1 hi(dango)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(dango)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J exit
NOP

getnothing:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 -1 ; No image
LUI A1 hi(nothing)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(nothing)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J exit
NOP

NoCoinsToShop:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 -1 ; No image
LUI A1 hi(ByeMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ByeMessage)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J exit
NOP

goodexit:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE A0 V0
LUI T1 hi(p1_char)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(p1_char) ; Load Player 1's Character address
LI T0 0x38 ; Distance between each player's Character address
MULT A0 T0 ;  Multiply Current Player Index by S3
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to S3

ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get current Player's Star address
LBU T0 0(T1) ; Load address value into S2

ADDIU V0 T0 0x2BE ; Mario's Despair Index

JAL PlaySound
MOVE A0 V0
NOP

LI A0 -1 ; Player Index (Current Player)
LI A1 5 ; Animation Index (Star)
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40

exit:
LW S0 40(SP)
LW S1 36(SP)
LW S2 32(SP)
LW RA 44(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 48

.align 16

King Boo Carnival Enter Teacups v2.code:
; NAME: King Boo Carnival Enter Teacups v2
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|left_choice
; PARAM: Space|right_choice
; PARAM: Space|prev

; This demonstrates a prompt dialog.
; The player will be asked to choose left or right,
; and the choice will impact the direction they head.

; Note that in order to handle going in reverse,
; additional code would be needed.

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 32(SP)
SW S0 28(SP)

LI A0 -1
LI A1 -1
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2

LI A0 right_choice_chain_index
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; Current Space Index at V0
LI A1 right_choice_chain_space_index

LI A0 -1 ; Current Player's Index
LI A1 10 ; Frames it takes to turn
JAL 0x800ED20C ; RotatePlayerModel
MOVE A2 V0 ; Space Index to face towards

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

display_message:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (Boo)
LUI A1 hi(promptMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(promptMessage)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LUI A0 hi(ai_random_choice)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(ai_random_choice)
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
ADDU A1 R0 R0
MOVE S0 V0 ; S0 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
LI A0 0
BEQ S0 A0 go_right
NOP
LI A0 1
BEQ S0 A0 go_left
NOP
LI A0 2
BEQ S0 A0 view_map
NOP
; Should never reach right here. If so, fall into go_left.

go_left:
LI A0 -1
LI A1 left_choice_chain_index
LI A2 left_choice_chain_space_index
JAL SetNextChainAndSpace
NOP
J exit
NOP

go_right:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player's Index at V0
NOP

MOVE S4 V0 ; Copy Current Player Index to S4
MOVE A0 S4 ; Copy Current Player Index to A0
LI A1 5 ; A1 = The minimum amount of Coins to shop
JAL PlayerHasCoins ; Checks if Player has the minimum Coins 
NOP

BEQ V0 R0 badexit ; If the player doesn't have the Coins, exit
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player Index at V0
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual ; Adjusts the player's coins
ADDIU A1 R0 -5

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADDIU A0 V0 0
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange ; Shows the +coins effect
ADDIU A1 R0 -5

JAL SleepProcess ; Waits 30 frames for game to show coin change
ADDIU A0 R0 30
NOP

LI A0 -1
LI A1 right_choice_chain_index
LI A2 right_choice_chain_space_index
JAL SetNextChainAndSpace
NOP
LI A0 -1
LI A1 prev_chain_index
LI A2 prev_chain_space_index
JAL SetPrevChainAndSpace
NOP
J exit
NOP

badexit:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo laugh

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(nocoins)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(nocoins) ; This loads "noitem" into the Textbox
LI A2 0x0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
LI A3 0x0

; The rest here perform the "wait for confirmation"
; and probably messagebox teardown.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J go_left
NOP

view_map:
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J display_message
NOP

exit:
LW RA 32(SP)
LW S0 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

.align 16

; See the CPU Player AI wiki
ai_random_choice:
.word 0x00000000, 0x00000000, 0x064C9932

.align 16
promptMessage:
.byte 0x0B ; Start the message
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Standard padding for picture
.ascii "Welcome to the"
.byte 0x0A
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A
.ascii "Swirling Boo Buddies ride"
.byte 0xC2 ; "!"
.byte 0x0A ; Newline
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A
.ascii "You could win a"
.byte 0x06
.ascii " ticket"
.byte 0x08
.byte 0xC2
.byte 0x0A
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A
.ascii "Would you like to try"
.byte 0xC3 ; "?"
.byte 0x0A ; Newline
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Little more for option indent
.byte 0x0C ; Start option
.ascii "Sign me up"
.byte 0xC2
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; padding
.byte 0x29 ; Coin icon
.byte 0x3E ; x (multiply)
.ascii " 5"
.byte 0x0D ; End option
.byte 0x0A ; Newline
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A 
.byte 0x0C ; Start option
.ascii "Maybe next time"
.byte 0x85
.byte 0x0D ; End option
.byte 0x0A ; Newline
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A 
.byte 0x0C ; Start option
.ascii "View map"
.byte 0x0D ; End option
.byte 0

.align 16
nocoins:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A
.ascii "Hey"
.byte 0xC2
.ascii " You need"
.byte 0x07
.ascii " coins"
.byte 0x08
.ascii " for this ride"
.byte 0xC2
.byte 0xFF,0

King Boo Carnival Teacups v2.code:
; NAME: King Boo Carnival Teacups v2
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Space

;====================================================================
; IMPORTANT: This code is specifically designed to make a quiz for
;            player. If the player answers correctly, they win Coins.
;            If they get it wrong, they lose Coins. There are 6
;            questions total from which the game picks 1 at random.
;===================================================================

ADDIU SP SP -64
SW RA 60(SP)
SW S0 56(SP)
SW S5 52(SP)
SW S4 48(SP)
SW S3 44(SP)
SW S2 40(SP)
SW S1 36(SP)

LI A0 -1
LI A1 -1
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(greeting)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(greeting) ; This loads "noitem" into the Textbox
LI A2 0x0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
LI A3 0x0

; The rest here perform the "wait for confirmation"
; and probably messagebox teardown.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (Boo)
LUI A1 hi(pickcup)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(pickcup)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
J AILogic
NOP
AISelect:
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 S5 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S0 V0 ; S0 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
LI A0 0
BEQ S0 A0 cup
NOP
LI A0 1
BEQ S0 A0 cup
NOP
LI A0 2

cup:

LI A0 17 ; Sleep for 16 frames

JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; Current Space Index at V0

LI A1  1 ; Frames it takes to turn

LI A1 4 ; Animation Index (Dizzy)

LI A2 2

JAL PlaySound

LI A0 30

JAL GetRandomByte ; Random Int at V0

SLT S0 V0 T0 ; Is the number less than 84?
NOP

NOP

LI T0 0xAA
SLT S0 V0 T0 ; Is the number less than 170?
NOP
BNE S0 R0 correct
NOP

J incorrect
NOP

;BEGIN CORRECT ANSWER PATH===========================================
correct:
LI A0 4 ; Assigns Happening fade-in
JAL InitFadeIn
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-in

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Sleep for 16 frames

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player Index at V0
NOP

LI S0 0x0 ; Start with Player 1

START:
BEQ S0 V0 checkslots
NOP

ADDIU S1 S1 0x38 ; This makes it load the next Player's First Item
J START
NOP
;FIND CURRENT PLAYER END---------------------------------------------

;CHECK ITEM SLOTS START----------------------------------------------
checkslots:

LBU S2 0(S1) ; S2 is the value of the item in the first slot

ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to check Slot #2

NOP

getitem:

;SOUND START---------------------------------------------------------

; Use the Audio Player on PP64 to find other sound indexes to use
; Then use the following link to know what Sound Index you need
; https://pastebin.com/H1jxNFqr
JAL PlaySound 
NOP

ADDIU A0 R0 0 ; Number of frames the game waits for sound to finish
JAL SleepProcess 
NOP

;BEGIN CONGRATULATORY MESSAGE========================================
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none)

NOP

NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

NOP
MOVE S3 V0
MOVE A0 S3
LUI T1 hi(p1_char)

JAL PlaySound
MOVE A0 V0
NOP

LI A0 -1 ; Player Index (Current Player)
LI A1 5 ; Animation Index (Star)
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40

J exit
NOP
